thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Ekta

author: Ekta
title: Ekta
text:
All the crew were very caring and genuinely dedicated to deliver excellent costumer service. They catered to all the individual needs and delivered all the requests. The expidition staff was exceptional, we felt very safe with such experienced personnel on board. Booking and paperwork was tedious but they were very prompt with communications.
I would recommend posiedon expositions if you truly want to experience antartica :)
